member.name: T:Draw.io_Graph_Parser.GraphElement
member.summary: Class GraphElement is the basic class all the elements in a graph must derive from.

member.name: F:Draw.io_Graph_Parser.GraphElement.vl
member.summary: Istance variable vl represents the value of the graph element.
member.remarks: For Vertices, the value represents the human-readable id of the vertex; for -s, it represents the cost; for -s, it represents the text itself.
